recipe.title: Ghee Rice | Neychoru (Malabar Style)
recipe.ingredients:
Kaima Rice (Jeerakasala Rice) – 3 Cups (600 gm)
Ghee – 4+1 Tablespoons
Cardamom – 4 Nos
Cloves – 6 Nos
Cinnamon Stick – 3 Inch Piece
Mace – a little
Onion – 2 Nos (Small Size) (200 gm)
Water – 4½ Cup
Lime Juice – 1 Teaspoon
Salt – ¼ + 1¾ Teaspoon
Refined Oil – 4 Tablespoons
Cashew Nut – 2 Tablespoons
Raisins – 1½ Tablespoon
Sugar – ½ Teaspoon
recipe.steps: Steps not available - please watch the video or add manually
recipe.notes: The provided input did not include step-by-step instructions. Mace is optional. This dish is traditionally prepared with Kaima Rice and is ideally served with veg or non-veg gravy type curries.
